item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. VSCode's SSH agent is bananas (184 points | 93 comments)
2. The PS2's backwards compatibility from the engineer who built it (2020) (56 points | 10 comments)
3. Hotline for modern Apple systems (10 points | discuss)
4. Station of despair: What to do if you get stuck at end of Tokyo Chuo Rapid Line (316 points | 182 comments)
5. A brief history of code signing at Mozilla (185 points | 66 comments)
6. Show HN: ExpenseOwl – Simple, self-hosted expense tracker (102 points | 31 comments)
7. Implementing a Game Boy emulator in Ruby (25 points | 4 comments)
8. Oral History of Andy Bechtolsheim (2015) [pdf] (4 points | discuss)
9. Starlink in the Falkland Islands – A national emergency situation? (11 points | 3 comments)
10. Asahi Linux lead developer Hector Martin resigns from Linux kernel (568 points | 503 comments)
11. Visual explanations of mathematics (2020) (82 points | 15 comments)
12. Show HN: A website that heatmaps your city based on your housing preferences (215 points | 80 comments)
13. Stop using zip codes for geospatial analysis (2019) (155 points | 117 comments)
14. Radiation belts detected around Earth after solar storm (118 points | 51 comments)
15. Three-nanite: Unreal Nanite in Three.js (178 points | 30 comments)
16. Show HN: Transductive regular expressions for text editing (218 points | 67 comments)
17. The origins of 60-Hz as a power frequency (133 points | 174 comments)
18. Unobtanium 6502 based KIM-1 part now obtanium with FPGA (8 points | 3 comments)
19. Zep AI (YC W24) is hiring engineers to build SOTA agent memory ( | hide)
20. Portland's exploding Liberty Bell (2020) (50 points | 4 comments)
21. Bolt: Bootstrap Long Chain-of-Thought in LLMs Without Distillation [pdf] (3 points | discuss)
22. Children's arithmetic skills do not transfer between applied and academic math (135 points | 148 comments)
23. The superconductivity of layered graphene (114 points | 29 comments)
24. Donald Knuth's 2024 Christmas Lecture: Strong and Weak Components [video] (374 points | 63 comments)
25. Show HN: HN as TikTok, welcome to HN hell (124 points | 44 comments)
26. Apple ordered by UK to create global iCloud encryption backdoor (1103 points | 574 comments)
27. Show HN: Play with real quantum physics in your browser (121 points | 67 comments)
28. German civil activists win victory in election case against X (211 points | 210 comments)
29. The inevitability of the borrow checker (124 points | 59 comments)
30. The Age of Agent Experience (92 points | 38 comments)
